info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 4:34PM CDT until July 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Fort Worth TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding of the Lampasas River is occurring.
* WHERE...Bell County along the Lampasas River upstream of Stillhouse Hollow Lake.
* WHEN...Until 800 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding along the Lampasas River as well as smaller creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is ongoing. Farm to Market Road 2760 from Maxdale to Highway 195 is currently experiencing floodwater impacts. The river is moving swift and carrying a significant amount of debris.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The Lampasas River continues to rise at the gauge near Ding Dong, which is currently at 37.70 feet. This is nearly a 30 foot rise since this morning. The river will likely crest in the next 1 to 2 hours before falling quickly later this evening.
- Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harker Heights, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Ding Dong, Maxdale and Youngsport.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Keep children away from storm drains, culverts, creeks, and streams. Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING
